description: Provides an AWS Network Firewall Resource Policy Resource for a rule group or firewall policy.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Policy.description: JSON formatted policy document that controls access to the Network Firewall resource. The policy must be provided **without whitespaces**.  It is recommended to use [jsonencode](https://www.terraform.io/docs/configuration/functions/jsonencode.html) for formatting as seen in the examples above. For more details, including available policy statement Actions, see the [Policy](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/network-firewall/latest/APIReference/API_PutResourcePolicy.html#API_PutResourcePolicy_RequestSyntax) parameter in the AWS API documentation.

ResourceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule group or firewall policy.
